result.execSummary:
All charges against Kong M. Vang in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kong M. Vang is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kong M. Vang

records.addlTxt:
Defendant extradicted to MN (picked up on 4/21/2022)

State to file dismissal

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called:4:05 p.m.
INCLUDES: 22CF442, 22CM358. 
State appears by ADA Alex Lech in person. Defendant appears from MCJ, with Atty Heather Roehr.
VRCW.
Date and time set for an extradition hearing in 22CF442. 

ADA Lech motions the COURT to amend the bond to a $10,000.00 signature bond.
Atty Roehr states no objections.
COURT ORDERS $1,000.00 signature bond, same conditions as previously posted.

COURT recites history of fugitive complaint for the state of MN.
COURT advises Defendant of rights regarding extradition.
Defendant wishes to waive extradition, signs form for the same.
COURT receives waiver of extradition.
COURT finds waiver has been freely, voluntarily, and knowingly made.
COURT signs certification on waiver.

DATES:
PTC w/JA: 5/4/22 @ 3:10 p.m. 

Adjourned: 4:13 p.m.

No contact with victim(s): A.M. & K.C.; Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening. Prints and Photos.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant
